alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 3:41AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 12 inches above 7500 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...From Noon today to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
